attributes.action: Seize assets from David Cameron and re-distribute to Syrian Refugees
attributes.background: With the humanitarian crisis reaching fever pitch and ruling political elite sweeping the issue under the carpet and generally treating refugees as sub-humans, we suggest that all assets should be seized and put to better use supporting victims of the Syrian War.

rejection.details:
The Prime Minister's personal assets aren't the responsibility of the UK Government or Parliament. 

If you wanted to, you could start a petition asking for the Government to increase the funding it is giving to assist refugees from Syria instead.
